org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.iostream.reader
Interface IDataReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
DelimitedReader, FixedWidthReader, LineReader, RegexMultiLineReader, RegexReader, StringReader
public interface IDataReader

Interface that represents something that can read data from an InputStream. Implementations could be based around strings or specific binary formats.

Author:
perryj

Method Summary
 void close()
          close any readers that have been setup on the current InputStream
 java.lang.Object read()
          read some data from InputStream that has been set
 void setInputStream(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
          resets the implementation with a new InputStream, subsequent calls to read() will read from that stream.
